short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension detects visits to digital game stores and provides you with the best offers from Gocdkeys.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save on every digital game purchase with our Chrome extension! When you visit stores like Steam or Epic Games, our tool automatically shows you the best deals available for the games you're browsing. Connect directly with Gocdkeys to make sure you don't miss out on the lowest price on your favorite games - install it now and start enjoying great savings instantly!
